post:
INIZ is the ultimate destination providing top quality VPS hosting services. At an affordable budget and customers in mind our VPS hosting services is the best solution with complete control and root access.

INIZ happily operates with three locations with more launching soon, we currently have presence in Amsterdam, Netherlands (Europe) and we cover 2 parts of United States with enterprise nodes in Los Angeles (West Coast) & New York City (East Coast). We own our IPs directly from RIR and with over a year in the business, we are one of the most competitive hosts out there with incredible performance to price ratio.

All our equipment is owned with the latest enterprise hardware including HP Gen8 & SuperMicro branded servers utilising Dual E5-2650 and 2620 CPUs, 8-12 Enterprise HDD Arrays in RAID10 for redundancy and made even better with SSD Caching.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

Frequently Asked Questions

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

Why are prices so low?

- We own all our hardware and network equipment in all locations thus decreasing our monthly costs massively, as a result we are able to provide outstanding value and enterprise solutions.

All our nodes are powered by the latest CPUs, SSD Caching & Enterprise Hard Drives giving us the edge over our competitors massively and exceeding clients expectations.

Is there an control panel?

- Manage all your virtual machines from one panel, where you have the ability to reinstall on the fly and view your current usage.

- You have complete control over your VPS with full root access and ability to view historical graphs for load (OpenVZ), bandwidth and HDD activity (KVM). Clients with OpenVZ VMs can set Reverse DNS, reinstall within minutes with pre-made templates and enable TUN/TAP/PPP straight from the control panel if they wish to setup VPN. With our KVM range, you get full virtualisation allowing to install your own kernels and partitioning as well as encrypting your drives.

Is the server Managed?

- At this price it would be unrealistic to offer management, so all services sold are unmanaged. However if you need some quick help, don't be shy to ask. Our friendly support will be available to help you with your queries.

Do you have an refund policy?

- We offer no questions asked full refund on your first service with INIZ if requested within 7 days from making your payment

What payment methods do you accept?

- We accept Bitcoins, Paypal & Debit/Credit Card Payments
